popularityCurve.label: when our sons and daughters put their lives on the line to defend the rest of us the last thing they should fear is being attacked by one of our own

clusterList.phrase: when our sons and daughters put their lives on the line to defend the rest of us the last thing they should fear is being attacked by one of our own
the youngsters need to get the right information the children are growing in an unsafe environment
parents and children who have been failed by our current system and must be protected
to have young children exposed to them on the playground between vmes and the eec is not safe
protecting our nation's sons and daughters is a sacred trust and we intend to do everything in our power to find the cause of this mishap so we may prevent it from happening again

it is important to realise that children first while not on a statutory basis still brings with it very clear responsibilities for those who become aware of child protection issues and these responsibilities are those we would reasonably expect everyone in society to live up to in relation to caring for children
today's publications have confirmed that our child protection services are chaotic uncoordinated and grossly inadequate
we want to try to find some way to think we are protecting children
